CVXPY
Minimize
  power(x + -1.0, 2.0)
Subject To
Bounds
 0.0 <= x
End
----------------------------------------
AFTER COMPILATION
Minimize
 Obj: +1 x_0
Subject to
 c1: -1 x_1 <= +0
 c2: +1 soc_t_1 -1 x_0 = +1
 c3: +1 soc_t_2 -1 x_0 = -1
 c4: +1 soc_t_3 -2 x_1 = -2
 c5: + [ +1 soc_t_2 * soc_t_2 +1 soc_t_3 * soc_t_3 -1 soc_t_1 * soc_t_1 ] <= +0
Bounds
 x_0 free
 x_1 free
 soc_t_2 free
 soc_t_3 free
End
----------------------------------------
SCIP
Minimize
 Obj: +1 x2
Subject to
 c1: +1 x2 +2 x + [ -1 x * x ] >= +1
Bounds
 x2 free
End
